attributes.action: Introduce a 4 day working week in UK permanently
attributes.additional_details: 4 Day working week Will create more employment for those unemployed. It will create a happier & productive economy.
attributes.background: Introducé a 4 day working week to help families spend more time , be healthier & reduce the burden on Nhs for stress related disease.

rejection.details:
UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work. This would be a decision for employers.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317794
